description: For a hearty soup to warm you up on cooler nights, try this healthier, vegan slow-cooked minestrone soup recipe.
keywords: Minestrone,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Zucchini,May 2021,Halal,Vegetarian,Vegan,Autumn,Slow cooker,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Healthier Slow-Cooked Minestrone Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
0.5 bunch Macro Organic continental parsley (roughly chopped, plus extra leaves to serve)
450g Macro Organic frozen cut green beans
1.5 cups Macro Organic wholemeal pasta spirals

recipeInstructions.text: Place oil, onion, chickpeas, passata and parsley in a 5.5L slow cooker. Add 1.5L hot water. Cover and cook on low for 7 hours (or high for 3 1/2 hours).
Add zucchini, green beans and wholemeal pasta. Increase heat to high. Cook for a further 1 hour or until pasta and zucchini are tender. Season. Serve soup topped with extra parsley.
